item.title: Extend allow in Tenant Allow/Block List allow entries in a transparent data driven manner
item.description: This feature is Available to customers who have Exchange Online Protection or Defender for Office 365 Plan 1 or Plan 2 across WW, GCC, GCCH, DoD. Transparency inside Tenant Allow/Block List Recently we launched the last used date for allowed or blocked domains, email addresses, URLs, or files inside the Microsoft Defender XDR. For block entries, the last used date is updated when the entity is encountered by the filtering system (at time of click or during mail flow).
